website_summaries.verdict: A balaclava that protects well in mild winter conditions, working best in temperatures between 20 and 40 degrees Fahrenheit.
pros: This 100% polyester balaclava fits most wearers very well
Wicks away sweat and helps repel snow and water
Very lightweight and thin enough to fit under helmet, goggles and face protection
cons: Barely windproof, and downright dangerous in subzero conditions

customer_reviews.title: Versatility is great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my son’s cosplay outfit. He has 4,000 plus followers so it’s important his pieces are well made. Since he wears a full mask in the front we both love the fact it can be worn on the face but most importantly for him under the chin. It fits well, has great neck coverage and is very breathable. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: The Umbrella Soldier

customer_reviews.title: It's great because it doesn't get soggy from my breath like ...
customer_reviews.text: It's great because it doesn't get soggy from my breath like with my fleece one, yet it perfectly blocks the wind and icy air. I got it to do a Winter Warrior fundraiser and have to walk/run outside no matter the temperature!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Warner

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Self efficient keeps my face warm as ever in these brutal conditions in ny, a great buy and I would def recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: illaquana a.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. It is Light weight and fits veey well
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. It is Light weight and fits very well. The material is breathable and moisture wicking. I mainly use it for mountain biking through rain or snow during winter time.
customer_reviews.author: regular-dude

customer_reviews.title: Boy was I happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mask because my girlfriend and I were going to go snowboarding in whistler. Boy was I happy with this purchase, it was so freaking cold on the top of the mountain that if i didn't have it my face would have frozen off. Plus points for stylish look under my goggles and helmet
customer_reviews.author: Richard Leu

customer_reviews.title: Wind proof
customer_reviews.text: This ski mask works great for keeping wind out. It didn’t really warm my face but since it kept the wind out it didn’t need warming. My biggest complaint however was when I talked the material would keep finding its way into my mouth which was kind of annoying. Otherwise the material was thin but not flimsey and did the job to keep the wind out. If you’re going super freezing cold I would recommend one that will keep you warm as well. For me however for snowboarding worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just went skiing and snow mobiling in Colorado and LOVED this balaclava!!! My poor husband bought something much more expensive and was so unhappy with it. It allows easy breathing and air flow, gets cool- but NOT wet!!! Protects from wind and keeps you warm! I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try
customer_reviews.text: It’s been a great thing to add to my winter running routine. I wish the Mouth part would dry faster when your breathing in cold air but otherwise, I’m very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ARC

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Crap for stopping wind
customer_reviews.text: How can I put this? Its constructed well but its more like slipping woman's silky panties over your face... It provides about that much protection. also with it fully worn, your breath wets down the fabric immediately then it freezes in the wind chill.. I wont start on how it fogs your glasses if you wear them.. wish i could return it but it died at a warming barrel fire
customer_reviews.author: William M. Conlin

customer_reviews.title: Good for mild temps.
customer_reviews.text: This balaclava is nice in the way that it can be used in the winter for mildly cold temps, and in the summer for motorcycle riding or whatever else. It is very easy to breathe through. I like that I can use it as a full face mask, or just a hat, or anywhere in between. Although, I live where the weather could be 10° and 25mph wind, so the thin, not-wind-proof material isn't optimal for MY circumstances. Since that is not the fault of the producer or seller, this item is as described and is a very convenient item to have.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Zupfer

customer_reviews.title: Dual purpose uses
customer_reviews.text: being arthritic it's a bit hard to put on, but once on it fits tight & is comfortably warm, my bedroom is cold- 40'F so I tried it on in there & it helps keep my nose warm which is a problem for me. It felt nice & warm. I'd recommend it for older people as well as athletic people.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product. Almost dumb-proof to wear and truly holds up in the cold. Couldn’t be happier with the mask. Also there are multiple ways you can wear it so that’s another plus
customer_reviews.author: Khari Climes

customer_reviews.title: NOT WINDPROOF
customer_reviews.text: I specifically bought this because I need a balaclava for winters winds. But this product is no way windproof, asi you can see in the image, is impossible for those pores to stop wind passing throw.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Miguel Valdes

customer_reviews.title: Material is too thin-my face is still cold...
customer_reviews.text: I’m not thrilled about the product. The material is extremely thin and super breathable so cold air just goes right through it. The already cold feeling is even more pronounced when I inhale. It’s completely useless for cold weather and I’m pretty sure the people who sell these know that. I’ll keep shopping around for something thicker and warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Imoji

customer_reviews.title: Plasticy and cheap
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what I was expecting with the price so low, but this didn’t fit, it smelled AWFUL, and did seem like it would be particularly warm.
customer_reviews.author: k8nyc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my purchase, the item is just like the description, also prompt delivery. Great seller
customer_reviews.author: Santiago Páez

customer_reviews.title: Thankfully, not an N95
customer_reviews.text: Due to the current pandemic, the trend of asymptomatic folks wearing masks has kicked up lately and I wanted to do my part. All I had was an N95 mask, which was hot, uncomfortable, and fogged my glasses. This balaclava has none of those issues. It's thin, light weight, and stretchy, it fits perfectly. And I can breathe! High marks to Adam & Linda Williams. Thanks guys, now I can protect my fellow human beings and stay comfortable and stylish while doing so.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Angone

customer_reviews.title: Good if you're planning on robbing a bank
customer_reviews.text: I specifically wanted a cold weather mask that blocked the wind. The product description said it blocked the wind. When I got it, the package said it blocked the wind. When I took it out of the package, the mask was scarcely thicker material than a pair of pantyhose, and not only could I blow through it, I could see through it. I returned it because I did not see it blocking any wind at all. NB - Usually the garments that block wind will have a thin neoprene layer between the covering, so I will pay closer attention next time.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M.

customer_reviews.title: Cold weather face mask
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had the opportunity to use the mask yet. It arrived as promised. I thought the material would be thicker but I think it will be sufficient. I would order again if I could get in my favorite coloe.
customer_reviews.author: Tommie Galloway

customer_reviews.title: Thin.  Not windproof.  Tight fitting.
customer_reviews.text: Thin material that is anything but wind proof. Tight fitting. Smells like a chemical.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: This Self Pro Face Mask will be a Perfect Substitute to Shield the Coronavirus
customer_reviews.text: I ordered face masks to wear during this coronavirus pandemic if I needed to go out for groceries — but I won't be receiving them until May. Since I need to go out tomorrow — I've decided to wear my "Self Pro Face Mask" as a substitute. I think it will be better than nothing at all!
customer_reviews.author: fastrecipes-20

customer_reviews.title: It's very breathable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mask to run a 5k race in frigid temps. It kept my face warm and dried quickly. It's very breathable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: K. Maynard

customer_reviews.title: SUPER FACIAL AND HEAD COVER UP !
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product, and so adaptable in coverage and types of weather. I give AMAZON credit for making it available to it's wide range of customers.I plan to wear it in often in both hot and cold weather. The materiel is soft and comfortable, and will be easy to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Stay Safe, Stay Healthy
customer_reviews.text: I got three of these ski masks to cover my face to protect me from this horrendous virus. I had a couple of N95 masks left over from a construction project completed over a year ago. I wear the ski mask over the N95 mask. For that purpose these masks are perfect.. breathable, and light weight, so won't be too hot come summer. Not very stylish but perhaps we will be reconsidering what is deemed fashionable during the time of Covid-19
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly snug and not too tight.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike. Great strong material and stitching. Just as advertised. Comfortable and stretchy. Bought it for motorcycle but would like another to cut the grass. Great protection and versatility of use. Loved the Thank You Card concept, not everyone is that appreciative and it shows care for quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Revenge of the Ninja
customer_reviews.text: Just received it today. My purchase actually came a whole five days sooner than expected. A big thumbs up for that. After trying it on and acting like "Revenge Of The Ninja" (old '80s movie) for an hour or so I realize I really love this thing. Very light weight and stretchy. Absolutely not too thick for the Non-winter seasons for work. AND... a very touching side note, it came with a thank you card from the owner of the company, which is the real reason why I'm writing this review. I appreciate good salesmanship and the extra effort to make customers happy. So I thank you for this product, Mr. Williams.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Hemphill

customer_reviews.title: Not great for extreme cold weather but comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Comfortable, breathable material against your skin - Easy to adjust - Long neck length to insert into jacket - Covers the nose Cons: - Did not keep out the cold wind well, but I wore it underneath a wool balaclava (2 layers) and that worked fine
customer_reviews.author: SwingBack

customer_reviews.title: PROTECTIVE FACE MASK FOR COVID-19 AND OTHER AIRBORNE IRRITANTS
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this product and I'm very happy with my purchase. I've recommended it to family and friends. It is reasonably priced, well-made, easy to put on and comfortable to wear. It was developed by a small family owned USA business and comes with a lifetime warranty. I'm happy to support, endorse and promote this product. Thank you Adam & Linda Williams for inventing Balaclava Face Mask.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Thomas

customer_reviews.title: It's good, but not amazing
customer_reviews.text: In full disclosure, I might have expected more than it was designed for. When you first put it on, you think there's no way it'll keep my face warm, but it does an OK job. At 40 degrees and 75 mph on my motorcycle, my face didn't freeze. I mean, you could still feel the cool air, but it was definitely much better than riding without it. I have a concern about the longevity, as it came with a few loose threads, but it's light weight and very portable. Very easy to keep in my motorcycle bag. Plus at the price point, I can't complain too much.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky

customer_reviews.title: If it is COLD and WINDY where you'll use this, maybe try a different product.
customer_reviews.text: Ok for the cooler days when my hubs uses it to ride his motorcycle... but definitely not effective when you are snowmobiling in 10 degree weather. Good for if you are just going for a walk and it isn't too terribly windy. It's good up to a certain MPH I should say. It is cold and windy in Iowa so it is hard to misinterpret this products title "WINDPROOF, COLD WEATHER." I gave 3 stars instead of 2 because it is good at moisture wicking and breathability.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S

customer_reviews.title: Ninja approved
customer_reviews.text: Fit very snug! Easy to wear a lot of ways. Great material too for a ninja
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable material, well made, and a great fit! Suits my purpose of Mountain Bike riding well!
customer_reviews.author: Andre Hanief

customer_reviews.title: Good multi-purpose face mask
customer_reviews.text: I bought this face mask to replace one that I lost and this one works better. The material is very thin and fits better under my ski helmet without giving up any warmth. The interesting feature is the split top which enables you to wear it as neck gator and nose/mouth cover if the temps are spring like, and you don't want any head covering. I tried wearing it in this mode also at the start of the COVID-19 pandemic when I was power walking 2 miles around my neighborhood. It was too warm around the neck in 80 degree temps (no surprise). But for skiing, it is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: P. Fleury

customer_reviews.title: Another Use for Your Good Quality Balaclava
customer_reviews.text: Interesting enough, I was searching for face mask during thus COVID crisis and using an old NOMEX balaclava as a mask. Found this one on Amazon after searching my regular suppliers. It arrived much earlier that Amazon predicted. The quality is great. Size is true to fit. Fabric is perfect for multi-season and multi-purpose use. Breathable, unlike the old NOMEX mask that was really hot to wear. Washable. Versatile. My go to mask for my non-medical grade COVID-19 protection.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for winter motorcycle riding.
customer_reviews.text: For winter time motorcycle riding there is nothing better than this balaclava ski mask. The cloth isn't so thick as to cause the helmet to be tight, yet provides protection against the cold air. The opening for the eyes is wider than most balaclavas which allows for glasses to be worn. I have two other balaclavas which are thicker, not as comfortable under the helmet, and too small of an eye opening. If you ride motorcycles during the winter, you'll love this balaclava!
customer_reviews.author: Doug Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: Fabric is very thin throughout.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for extreme cold weather skiing, but fabric is very thin, especially around the neck. Haven’t tried it skiing yet, but expect it will be cold.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and comfort.
customer_reviews.text: This balaclava is made exceptionally well. It fits comfortably and doesn't squeeze or pinch the face. The mesh area is breathable and doesn't trap breath moisture inside, so you aren't likely to fog up like with other products. The material size is cut in a way that the stitching doesn't leave you looking like zipper face when you take it off after having it on for a while. Super pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Koekebacker

customer_reviews.title: Better than nothing but as warm as others and expensive
customer_reviews.text: This hat, while better than nothing is not as warm as N-ferno. It is more like the mesh in front of the mouth of that hat (or maybe a bit more closed). Also, this is the same exact product as 'Dimples' - which was selling two for this price (about $14), so it's definitely not worth the price. But I wouldn't recommend it even for $7, because even above freezing it didn't give much protection - especially from the wind, becasue it's more of a mesh material than a good, closed and insulated material.
customer_reviews.author: Joe2

customer_reviews.title: Not for skiing.
customer_reviews.text: This might be good for skiing in warmer weather, but it will not keep you warm in the low 30's. Tried it out this past weekend and my face was frozen once the temps hit 32° and the snow started falling. I'm not sure why so many people reviewed this product so high for winter sports. It's very thin, but something else.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: It's mesh!
customer_reviews.text: It says "Windproof Ski Mask Cold Weather Face Mask Thermal Hood" -- but this is made with a MESH, so completely useless for cold weather activities: it is not windproof or "thermal". I returned it and ordered "ZERDOCEAN Winter Windproof Fleece Thermal Full Face Motorcycle Ski Mask Balaclava" as a replacement. This one is thick and I think will keep me warm on those long, cold winter rides.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: Stinky
customer_reviews.text: I washed this a few times thinking that the weird plastic smell would come out...but it still faintly remains. I used it a few times and it was helpful when it was freezing cold out, under my motorcycle helmet. I don't really use it now because it smells like plastic/silicone stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Wong

customer_reviews.title: Not for COVID-19
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars or less if you are looking to use it for COVID-19. 5 stars for this Balaclava because it does what the description says. Note that it is not advertised for Covde-19. This is a great summer Balaclava but it in no way will it work for COVID-19. Sure if you want to wear something for the sake of wearing something it works. If you want to use it for COVID-19 it is a fail. You will need wear it backwards so you can double the hood section up to cover your mouth. That works but doing so is a bit uncomfortable. A neck gaiter folded in half works better and is a lot more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: TechWolf

customer_reviews.title: I can breath!
customer_reviews.text: Really glad I got this. Can't breath well through the masks. This is so thin I don't know if provides supreme covid protection to others but certainly it's going catch most any droplets and if any go through it won't go very far. It's not like I am in closed quarters face speaking to anyone. Plus I was afraid a mask would pop off and so would my very expensive hearing aids so I didn't wear them. Trying to talk to a checkout person behind plexiglass and me not wearing my hearing aids is one more life hassle I don't need.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but gets damp and ski goggles fog up
customer_reviews.text: Wore this skiing and at higher elevations, had a real problem with my goggles fogging. Had to leave my nose exposed, otherwise my breath was getting up into my goggles and actually freezing from the cold. Also seemed to get pretty damp from my breath and wasn't impressively warm. It served it's purpose but I would recommend finding one with more venting around the nose/mouth so the moisture from your breath can escape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Follow up Review
customer_reviews.text: I've worn the Windproof Ski Mask several times now. I recently wore it biking around town. I stopped in a local strip center parking lot, locked up my bike, and went in to get a hot chocolate from Starbucks. When I came back out, a mall security guard was standing by my bike and asked me in a snide voice if I was a Nija warrior. I was tempted to say yes and then give him a backhand to the throat. Instead I said I had common sense enough to wear appropriate clothing when out in the cold. He then walked off in a cloud of shivering, self-imposed ignorance and I rode my bike home...very warm and comfortable thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Rick of many trades

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than expected
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than expected. My only complaint when wearing with my motorcycle helmet is that the seam/overlap or whatever creates an impression on my cheeks after rides longer than 30 minutes. Although I have to contribute this to my helmet being a tight fit. Coldest I've used this product (with helmet on) was 39 degree before windchill (20mph wind) going 65mph for 15 minutes to/from work. My face wasn't cold. I do pull it down under my nostrils when going slow or at a stop because it will fog my visor/glasses up. This was expected.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Don't trust them, don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: Not even close to what they advertise. Not much thicker than a nylon stocking. And it was one piece. Not like the two-piece picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: I was somewhat concerned that the quality may not be good given the price. I was pleasantly surprised to find that it is extremely well made and very durable. It fits securely without being too tight and does not slide down, like some others do. I can wear this underneath my motorcycle helmet without getting too hot. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: its ok
customer_reviews.text: Kind of thin but I like it. Use filter if you wear it during pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: Jonquel M. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Use it weekly, at work
customer_reviews.text: As a chef I need to stand quite a while in the freezer to complete my inventory. I used to use a wool cap but my face would still become frozen. Now I use this balaclava AND my wool cap which saves majority of my face from freezer burn. It is a lightweight balaclava but since I'm used to standing long periods in our walk-in refrigerator and freezers to me is now comfortable and more tolerable. I'd think it would work great during skiing, but not until my next vaca since I live in Hawaii... Haha!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had to return it. It's NOT windproof. NOT ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it. It's NOT windproof. NOT for cold weather. Just a thin tight fabric to put over your head.
customer_reviews.author: Kishan N.

customer_reviews.title: I would purchase again and will recommend!
customer_reviews.text: WORKS VERY WELL!! I have worn this outside in temps around -20 to -30 for over an hour and my face stayed warm (I live in MN)! However,... I could feel a slight chill where air was exchanged (tip of nose mostly). I think the moisture from my breath was making the face shield cold/freezing over time. Again, though, that was in serious subzero temps for over an hour! I would purchase again and will recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SassyZinger

customer_reviews.title: My daughter turned this balaclava into a mask.
customer_reviews.text: My 12-year-old wanted this balaclava to turn it into a mask. She cut pieces out of foam, used a hot glue gun to add the foam to the balaclava, then covered it with fur. The balaclava is great and fit my head (a grown man with a big noggin) and her head too. Great quality. Would order again. If I end up dead, please tell the police that this creepy mask might have come alive and killed me...
customer_reviews.author: Dustin L. Dopps

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I like the balaclava very much! The material is thin enough to comfortably wear, but still warm. I like that I can remove it from my head & face but still keep it around my neck, which I did when I was walking into Starbucks. Once I was back in the parking lot, I pulled it back over my head. The only part that bugs me is that I wear eyeglasses and those get fogged up when I breathe, so I have to exhale out through my mouth or remove the part of the mask that covers the nose & mouth.
customer_reviews.author: luvbizkit

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for an Indispensable Item for Anyone Who Works Outside during Winter
customer_reviews.text: How come stores charge so much for these things? That pretty much sums up my review. This thing works, looks as good as any terrorist gunman or Antifa thug can manage, and gets the job done for me at work by covering my neck and ears. It also breathes well when covering my mouth. The only improvement I can see is to make it extend a little more below the neck, so that way it can be securely tucked beneath a shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Grauenstadt

customer_reviews.title: Breathable and Looks Cool!
customer_reviews.text: Helped keep this Las Vegan (person from the HOT Las Vegas) not a LOST VEGAN (lol) warm during a week long trip to Big Bear, CA in December. Very breathable, but comfortable to wear. Good quality and I enjoyed looking like a bad a** bank robber on my vacation. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - For Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: This product is well worth the $15.99 if you are going to use it regularly. In current times it doubles as a protective cloth mask that meets CDC recommendations. However, it is also necessary when skiing/snowboarding as the cold wind can really hurt an exposed bare face. No such problems when wearing a good Balaclava like this! Yes, you can get cheap Balaclavas at a store for $5-$6, but without fail, they tear, lose elasticity, and fall apart after a couple months due to the garbage quality of their materials. No such issue with a product like this. You pay $10 more for the product to last 10x as long. Well worth it to me, I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to deploy in the various advertised configurations
customer_reviews.text: I obtained face mask to evaluate it for use as part of meeting mask requirements during the pandemic. So my main objective was to use it for covering nose and mount. It is unclear how to make that happen given the piece. The hood part does not fold neatly down into the neck section and the part covering nose and mouth slips down. Of course, that is to not mention the rather limited value in reducing viral spread, being one layer of rather porous material.
customer_reviews.author: W. E. Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Did they send me the wrong mask?
customer_reviews.text: This is nothing like what's advertised here...There's no point to it at all because the front is basically mesh, and therefore worthless.
customer_reviews.author: K7

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cold Weather Running
customer_reviews.text: I wear this when running in colder temperatures (around 40 degrees). It keeps my head, ears, and face warm in the first couple miles of a run while my body is still heating up. It's also long enough to cover my neck and tuck into my collar. Once I warm up, it can be reconfigured easily while moving to keep me from getting too hot. It's also not too tight so I can wear headphones while wearing this as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Quiggle

customer_reviews.title: Second order is different material
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the first one on 4-12 & really like it as there is very little fleece & it seems it will work well in the Summer. Second one I ordered on 4-20 & just received it & it seems to me made of all fleece which I do not think will be as durable as the first one. I also think it will be to hot for the summer. I will keep both but will look elsewhere for one I can wear in the summer. If the second order was the same material as the first I would have given a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Doowop

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sub-freezing temperatures
customer_reviews.text: I bought a ski mask similar to this several years ago when temperatures were in the single digits for a New Years 5K run. It kept me absolutely warm. I have continued to use it during the winter for runs and bicycle rides and my head has never been cold. Because one of my sons is biking several miles to work in the winter cold every day, I bought him this Balaclava at a price much lower than what I paid for my similar mask. The Balaclava is going to be perfect for my son's chilly bike rides. It is great the way it converts into different forms, depending on how much protection he needs. I highly recommend the Balaclava.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: For winter cycling
customer_reviews.text: I cycle in the winter and this has helped a great deal. It's thin and very light and I can still place my helmet over it. It helps keep my head and face warm when cycling down the road at 12+ mph. I use this whenever the temp is 50 F or less. I don't like breathing through it, however, it does restrict air flow and when you are pushing hard, you need all the air you can get! So, I just pull that portion down under my chin... works well enough.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Miller

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like?
customer_reviews.text: It fits great. You can wear it in different ways. Breathable. Some have complained that its too thin, but right now I'm wearing it as my COVID-19 face mask here in Florida and it has come in clutch. I look way cooler than those people walking around with old t-shirts tied around their heads! Can't wait to use this thing on the slopes next season.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond A. Donato

customer_reviews.title: Fits my head and is surprisingly very comfortable to wear!
customer_reviews.text: The plastic pouch this ski mask comes-in looks cheap and doesn't compliment the ski mask, but don't let the cheap look fool you. When you take the ski mask out of the pouch you can feel it's nice and soft and feels "good quality"! When I put mine-on it always surprises me how well it fits my head and doesn't go out of alignment. I never have to worry about this ski mask shifting and blocking my vision. The mask stays in place. Save the clear plastic pouch to store the mask-in when you're not using it. The mask fits easily in the pouch. Good product! Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: J. Levesque

customer_reviews.title: Versatile balaclava
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight material. I live an hour from the Canadian border in North Dakota - this is definitely a little light as a solo head covering for the coldest parts of winter (we get temperatures around -20 to -40 Fahrenheit here) - but it's very versatile. It has great breathability so you don't get an ice block over your nose and mouth, and you can pair it with heavier accessories. It's really great for when you're going to be active outside in winter - whether that's for xc skiing, snowshoeing, or if you do work in the oil patch. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Harvill

customer_reviews.title: Not for cold temps
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading all the good reviews & how many was sold. I work outdoors year round and work at an airport in Ohio so winters can be very cold. I’m sure it’s better than nothing but this will not keep your face warm. It is very thin and can see through it. I wouldn’t buy again or recommend if your trying to stay warm. Put a pair of panties on your head and you’d get the same results.
customer_reviews.author: Jes

customer_reviews.title: Wear Under Bike Helmet
customer_reviews.text: I paid $10 for these and also had free Prime shipping. Nice fit on medium woman’s head. These are nice fabric and soft feeling. I bought for bicycle riding when the temperature is 40-50 degrees. I would need a heavier fabric for colder weather.
customer_reviews.author: Totally Cool

customer_reviews.title: ... a couple of weeks but the mask is working great. Temps have dropped down to the 30s F ...
customer_reviews.text: It's only been a couple of weeks but the mask is working great. Temps have dropped down to the 30s F in the morning. It definitely keeps me warm. I really notice the difference when I don't pull the mask down to cover my entire neck. The wind from riding a motorcycle on the highway at these freezing temps cut like a sharp knife. So the mask does it job and keeps me nice and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart @ FFX-LRV

customer_reviews.title: Not sure on this one
customer_reviews.text: This is a light, woven synthetic that wants to slid upwards over my nose and up to my eyes so I am constantly pulling it back into place. Also, as you are breathing a little heavier with it over your nose, every inhale pulls in a blast of cold air which completely defeats the purpose of keeping your face warm. My cheeks and neck can get cozy but my nose is cold. I may have to wear a thicker one over this one if I wear this one at all. If this is at all helpful, let me know by checking the box below.
customer_reviews.author: WholeLife

customer_reviews.title: Caution if you wear glasses
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this in the mail, I immediately went to a post office and a market with it. I appreciate the versatility of the product being able to be worn in multiple forms, and makes me look cool while protecting me against the environment. The only thing I would dislike about this fine product is that this and my pair of glasses do not go well together. The part that covers your mouth will still the air you exhale to blow up to your eyes, and therefore on my lenses, sometimes it made it hard to see but I adjusted so the air goes up outside my glasses and it worked alright.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: This product is made in China. I bought this because of the china virus so needless to say I threw it out immediately.
customer_reviews.author: christian g. christos

customer_reviews.title: Looks good in the pictures.. but the reality..
customer_reviews.text: Too lose .. cheap fabric.. keep falling down from your face.
customer_reviews.author: Ammar Alothman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for cold weather
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and not to tight or feel like it is strangling you. One size DOES fit all, it even fits on my 6 year old son. Great for cold weather and skiing/snowboarding. I think it would be to hot to wear in summer time (100 + degrees in Northern California). Overall, I’m very happy with the purchase and the price is great. I bought one for each of the family I liked it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Good product / Does what is needed
customer_reviews.text: With Covid I bought multiple masks and wanted to buy a mask I could keep around my neck. It is probably too thin to use only to fight covid. I wanted to check if it was good for COVID uses so I put a lighter 2 inches from face and blew the match out easily. Had to kind of double layer around my mouth and nose for it work for this purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Zeke Campos

customer_reviews.title: Warm, nice fit and not so great with glasses
customer_reviews.text: This face mask fits much better than another one I bought. It adjusts to the shape of the face and doesn't fall down as easily as others. The only thing I didn't like too much is that my glasses fog if I breathe through the nose but not so much when I breathe through the mouth. But that has happened with all face masks I've tried. Overall it is the face mask that I've liked the most and with the best fit around the face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Have used as both as a balaclava and as a scarf round my neck. Very warm. Fits under my motorcycle helmet nicely but my head is massive and it doesn’t quite cover my giant forehead as much as I’d like it to. But for the price I can’t really argue. It so good I’m gonna buy another one for the Mrs (her foreheads smaller so that’s a win!). We’re off to Cleveland for the holidays and I hear it’s snowing. This will be on my head 24/7! Or in my pocket.... did I mention it rolls up and fits nicely in my pocket?! Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC HEAD MASK...ESPECIALLY FOR THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic face mask the feels really good on and fits very well. I started out with one but since have ordered 3! They are lightweight but blocks wind and warm. I wear mine under another hat but I have also worn alone. It is easy to adjust to fit anyones head. I strongly recommend buying if you live in a cold windy area. Or if you enjoy winter sports. It is a great price for such a nice head mask.
customer_reviews.author: Honeycutt

customer_reviews.title: Windy@ Cold Chicago! AWESOME PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: Product came is advertised. Delivered within 2 days. It's extremely cold in December at 9 degrees in the a.m. kind of have a big head so if you're worried about the sizing you don't have to LOL. It's very breathable, and able to put my ski goggles on, and another hat if needed when I was out snow blowing and shoveling on our first snow is of the season. I would highly recommend this product especially at this price point you can't beat it. 100% satisfied. Jim from Chicago.
customer_reviews.author: James M Clark

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the cold out
customer_reviews.text: My son bought this for when he rides his bike in cold weather. He likes how it is thin, yet warm and is not at all itchy like some of the ones he's tried. It does have a funky smell when you take it out of the packaging, so a good washing is in order before you wear it. I'm just thankful to hear the end of the complaining about his painful nose from the cold
customer_reviews.author: SAinVATop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very effective at blocking the wind in 32F (0C) temperatures.
customer_reviews.text: It's quite thin, but blocks the wind on a bike ride very well. I ride for about 1 hour at a time in 32F temperatures. Comfortable. If I'm moving, my bike glasses don't fog even with this balaclava covering my mouth and nose. They do fog when I stop, but clear quickly. It fits me (I'm an adult) and my grade-school children. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Graham King

customer_reviews.title: Cant get better!!
customer_reviews.text: This balaclava is one of the best I have seen. Helps cover mouth, nose and ears from harsh weather and fits perfectly. Due to its elasticity, it can be stretched at a certain degree. Its extremely easy to wear and remove it (I photograph and hike and was able to wear and remove in just one hand) Its very lightweight and fits basically anywhere.. I would keep it in my jacket pocket and I would not notice its there. Perfect for cold/windy weather.
customer_reviews.author: Akshay

customer_reviews.title: Fits fine and breathable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a mask for COVID-19. Not for medical care but versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Lodge

customer_reviews.title: Its comfortable and breathable
customer_reviews.text: Today was my first day using this and i love it so far. I got it to wear at work during the corona virus. I work as a stocker in a grocery store. I like the breathability this mask has, its not too tight and doesnt fall when i talk, it helps me stay a little warmer while working in the freezer but doesnt get me too hot when im out of the freezer. Im glad i bought this for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Russo

customer_reviews.title: Just right for motorcycling
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for motorcycling and skying. This is one size fits all. I have a 60cm head (measured above ears and eyes - that's 23.6") and it fits just right. It is comfortable, versatile and fits under the helmet so well it is barely noticeable. I bought three (two for me to be able to clean one while I use the other) and one for my wife - I would buy more of these precise same ones if I needed more.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Perdu

customer_reviews.title: A Little Thin, But Overall Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after I lost my ski mask, and I read the reviews, expecting it to be a little thin when I ordered it, and most said it was quite warm. I used it to ski after I bought it and it was a very good weather barrier and also kept the cold out of my face. I like how I can easily adjust the mask based on where I'm skiing. After a while of skiing, though, the cold air was starting to get through and when I was going down the mountain, I could feel the cold wind. Overall it worked very well and I am very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Face mask
customer_reviews.text: this mask does it all! it keeps your face and head warm when its cold and windy outside and you decide to go for a run. it holds in place your wireless headphones if you decide to go for ride on your bike or go rollerblading. You're able to adjust it, which allows you to cover your head or/and your mouth. It's easy to wash and it's up and ready for another adventure, thanks Selfpro.
customer_reviews.author: Jonadab M.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This balaclava is very nice to have under my helmet and covers everything that is exposed. When dry, provides wonderful warmth and resistance to wind. Downside, i snowboard so its inevitable that it will get somewhat wet from sweat, snot, and the typical outcomes of outdoor sports. If there was a way to have something a bit thicker or possibly quick drying around the nose/mouth area....would improve the quality of this against the elements. Thanks for a wonderful product though. I very much enjoy using it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: We went skiing and snowboarding on Presidents Day, saw it was going to be raw, windy, cold and snowing hard so I bought four of these Balaclavas in preparation. Was questioned by a certain family member over the purchase (and price). No one's complaining now! Fit great, snug but not restrictive under a helmet or hat and kept the stinging wind and snow crystals from shredding our faces.
customer_reviews.author: Jim T.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Warm
customer_reviews.text: I have been waiting to use this for running outside in the winter. I just ran a 5k in 25 degree weather with a light wind. The face mask worked extremely well. The neck sleeve is plenty long to tuck into a jacket so no cold wind cuts through. The mask itself was very soft and flexible. I was able to fit wireless earbuds under it without the mask being so tight that the earbuds dug into my ears. The mask didn’t need any adjusting during my run. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Breathable Mask
customer_reviews.text: Great product that is well made. Delivery was fast considering the Coronavirus. I’m glad I was able to find it available as many vendors were sold out or shipping would just take too long. The product came with a nice personal thank you card with a direct contact to the business owners if you had any problems, and a lifetime warranty is also offered. If you’re looking for a face mask for the coronavirus, this is a good one as it is multi-purpose and can be used for other occasions after the pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable. As for heat
customer_reviews.text: We used these out west for a ski trip. They are very comfortable. As for heat, they did well with blocking wind, but I wouldn't call them overly warm like fleece or something. We skied in 30 degree weather that was sunny one day and snowy the next. Either way was fine. This one size fit all fit our 5 year old son up to my husband. So it's a great product as far as fit.
customer_reviews.author: Heavensenthorse

customer_reviews.title: Well made, warm, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This balaclava ski mask is very light weight, very warm in negative temperatures, and very comfortable to wear. I like it so much, I ordered another one today so I can as always wear a clean one. I use this when I am shovelling and snow blowing. Days like today, you have to go out more than once, so I like to wear a clean one each time. The mask is very well made. Hats off to the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Cooch

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight-A Plus or Minus Depending on Temp
customer_reviews.text: Used it on a 4 day backpacking trip in the mountains in Sept. Wore at night and morning. Comfortable and warm enough. It's lightweight--may not be enough in the dead of winter. However, I ordered a second one, and plan to wear two in colder weather. They should be just right, and I can switch to one during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, a quality, packaged well and very timely delivery. LOVE the thank you, special touch! The reason I gave it 4 stars because it fits very snug ---I have a lot of hair. I do recommend this product, though; it's thin enogh to wear in the summer and it does protect from dust on the ATV trails.
customer_reviews.author: Tye A

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Face and Mouth Covering While Cycling
customer_reviews.text: This is made with excellent quality material and the stitching is fine! Care and handling is also good. If you're looking for a covering to wear under a helmet or looking for something warmer to wear during the winter will running, you'll what to check these out! The price is great and the shipping is fast!
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Overall good.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in a timely manner. Was exactly as advertised. Light, breathable, movable, multiple wear options. Only reason for four stars is description says made in the US or imported. Not made in China, which the product was.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Evans

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price point
customer_reviews.text: It will help keep your face warm in wind, but not too warm. Some other reviewers have stated that this product is loose on their head, so please keep in mind that if you have a slightly wider head, such as myself, this product will not be loose on you. It is really good at keeping moisture in. Like, really good. I haven't warn it in the rain yet, but I think this product will be decent with keeping out freezing rain.
customer_reviews.author: EnjoyLife

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for snowboarding
customer_reviews.text: Purchased and wore this balaclava for snowboarding in Mammoth and it was perfect for my needs. Wore mostly just around neck & it kept the back of my neck warm and protected my face from the wind. Didn’t intrude on my breathing & wasnt overly heavy or constricting. The versatility is nice, even wore it as a headband after getting off the mountain.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I worked on a security team in upstate NY where I was outside a lot so I wanted something to keep the wind off my face and have a barrier between me and the cold. This worked great. I could put a beanie over it and it kept my face a lot warmer, still not completely warm but I was in a place where it was in the negatives on the regular so I didn't expect it to be completely warm.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

product_meta.title: Self Pro Summer Face Mask Balaclava Protection from Dust, UV & Aerosols - Reusable Bandana Face Cover
feature_bullets: Keep your family & yourself safe. Our Self Pro products provides ultimate protection from dust, aerosols, UV rays and elements.

Made with CoolMax premium hi-tech fibers to keep your face and neck cool and comfortable in hot weather. It is very soft and close to your skin so you can breath easily while enjoying a wrinkle free, no fade product that is easy to carry by being folded in a pocket
Our sun face mask is unisex & versatile with a perfect fit for women and men. It can be worn as a neck gaiter, balaclava, face cover, headband, sweatband or full face mask while staying protected

Super comfortable, elastic and soft. This sun mask will cover your neck and face as well, quality fabric would make you easy to breathe in. Make your life easier and more convenience to enjoy outdoor activities
Improved 2020 Design: longer neck and extra-long in front for better protection, improved cut and different sewing angle for better fit on your head: These small details make all the difference.
